mapper.select: select * from pets inner join owners o on pets.ownerId = o.ownerId inner join types t on pets.typeId = t.typeId where petId = #{petId}
select count(*) from pets inner join owners o on pets.ownerId = o.ownerId inner join types t on pets.typeId = t.typeId where petName like '%${petName}%'

select * from pets inner join owners o on pets.ownerId = o.ownerId inner join types t on pets.typeId = t.typeId where petName like '%${petName}%' order by petId limit ${(pageCode-1)*pageSize},${pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into pets (petName, petBirthday, typeId, ownerId, petPicture) values (#{petName}, #{petBirthday}, #{typeId}, #{ownerId}, #{petPicture})
mapper.select: select * from visits inner join pets p on visits.petId = p.petId inner join vets v on visits.vetId = v.vetId where p.petName like '%${petName}%' or v.vetName like '%${petName}%' limit ${(pageCode-1)*pageSize},${pageSize}
select count(*) from visits inner join pets p on visits.petId = p.petId inner join vets v on visits.vetId = v.vetId where p.petName like '%${petName}%' or v.vetName like '%${petName}%'
mapper.insert: insert into visits (petId, vetId, visitDate, description) values (#{petId}, #{vetId}, #{visitDate}, #{description})
